constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 69 (Wednesday, April 27, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. TIFFANY:
H.R. 7609.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 of the constitution,
Article 1, Section 9 of the constitution.
[Page H4575]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

title: To prohibit the appeal of the decision issued by the United States District Court for the Middle District of Florida determining that the mask mandate is unlawful, and for other purposes.
